tool.name: Azure Video OCR
tool.description: Generate AMP Video OCR using results from Azure Video Indexer

param.name: input_video
param.label: Input Video
param.help: Input video file used by Azure Video Indexer

param.name: azure_video_index
param.label: Azure Video Index JSON
param.help: Azure Video Index JSON file from Azure Video Indexer

param.name: azure_artifact_ocr
param.label: Azure Artifact OCR JSON
param.help: Azure Artifact OCR JSON file from Azure Video Indexer

param.name: dedupe
param.label: Dedupe
param.help: Whether to dedupe consecutive frames with same texts

param.name: duration
param.label: Duration
param.help: Duration in seconds to last as consecutive duplicate frames

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Generate AMP Video Optical Character Recognition output using results from Microsoft Azure Video Indexer. If "dedupe" option is checked, also generate AMP OCRR JSON with duplicate frames removed, i.e. consecutive frames with same texts within the specified duration.
